statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 1 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 15 \\ -9 \\ -9 \\ -12 \\ -9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 33 \\ -17 \\ -17 \\ -20 \\ -21 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
